CONTENT: こいつは特別だからね

CONTENT: 特別?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Special?

CONTENT: エリィや エリィのパパやママが⸺　宇宙で生きていくためには⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para que tu familia y tú sigan viviendo en el espacio,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In order for you, your daddy, and your mommy to live in space,

CONTENT: 適応できる体が必要なのさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you need to have an adaptable body

CONTENT: こんな兵器じゃなくてね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and not a weapon like this.

CONTENT: ルブリスは 私たちが目指すGUNDの未来
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lfrith representa el futuro que concebimos para el GUND.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Lfrith is the future of GUND that we're aiming for.

CONTENT: 人類の可能性を切り開く 新たな扉
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una nueva puerta hacia la frontera para toda la humanidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She is a new door that will open up new possibilities for humanity.

CONTENT: よく分かんない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't get it.

CONTENT: なら こいつと話してみるかい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then, do you want to try talking to her?

CONTENT: おいで エリィ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come here, Eri.

CONTENT: ここに 手をあててみな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Place your hand here.

CONTENT: これで ルブリスは エリィを認識した
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now Lfrith will recognize you.

CONTENT: この世界は怖くないって 教えてやってくれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Intenta decirle que no hay nada que temer.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tell her that this world isn't scary.

CONTENT: エリィはね エリクト・サマヤっていうの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My name is Ericht Samaya!

CONTENT: ケーキは好き?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you like cake?

CONTENT: 今日はエリィの誕生日なんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's my birthday today!

CONTENT: お誕生日の帽子も被るの!　どうした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Y llevaba un gorrito de cumpleaños! -¿Qué pasa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to wear my birthday hat! -What's wrong?

CONTENT: 評議会が会見を行うと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El Consejo dará una rueda de prensa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The council is about to hold a press conference.

CONTENT: 聞いてないぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wasn't told about this.

CONTENT: オックス・アースは外されています
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ochs Earth has been left out of this.

CONTENT: 分かった すぐ行く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Got it. I'm on my way.

CONTENT: エリィ 1人で戻れるか?　うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can you go back by yourself, Eri? -Yeah.

CONTENT: ママに心配かけるなよ　うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No hagas que se preocupe tu madre. Bien.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't make your mommy worry now. -Okay.

CONTENT: ケーキはね イチゴが乗ってるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The cake has strawberries on it.

CONTENT: ママがね...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You see, Mommy...

CONTENT: ユリシーズの配備完了しました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Deployment of Ulysses is complete.

CONTENT: いつでもいけます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can commence at any time.

CONTENT: 本社共々 予定どおり仕掛けろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Asántelo todo, incluido el cuartel, como planeamos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Raid it along with their headquarters according to the plan.

CONTENT: 評議会の承認は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't we need the council's approval?

CONTENT: 責任なら私が取る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll assume full responsibility.

CONTENT: 我々モビルスーツ 開発評議会は先ほど⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nosotros, el Comité de Desarrollo de Mobile Suits,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We, the Mobile Suit Development Council, have just now made the decision

CONTENT: ガンダムタイプの モビルスーツ開発を⸺　すべて凍結することに決定しました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: anunciamos que decidimos congelar el desarrollo de todos los Mobile Suits de tipo Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: to freeze all development of Gundam-type mobile suits.

CONTENT: これに伴い⸺　評議会は同機を開発した オックス・アース社に対し⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y el Consejo tomará por la fuerza a la empresa que los desarrolla, Ochs Earth,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In addition, we will forcibly seize Ochs Earth, the company that developed them,

CONTENT: 企業行政法による 強制執行を行います
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que actuó bajo la autoridad de las leyes administrativas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: under the authority provided by business administrative laws.

CONTENT: そんな...　うちを切り捨てるつもりか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es ridículo. ¿Nos usan para dar ejemplo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No way... -Are they planning to cut us off?

CONTENT: 入港予定の船は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any ships scheduled to enter port?

CONTENT: 輸送船が1隻　止めろ 入港させるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's one transport ship. -Stop it. Don't let it enter the port!

CONTENT: そしてモビルスーツ開発の⸺　秩序と倫理を守るため⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para proteger el orden y la ética del desarrollo de los Mobile Suits,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And to maintain order and ethics in the development of mobile suits,

CONTENT: 我々は監査組織 カテドラルの設立も決定しました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: decidimos crear una organización auditora, Cathedral.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we will establish an auditing organization named Cathedra.

CONTENT: ご紹介します　カテドラル統括代表　デリング・レンブランです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Les presentaré al supervisor jefe de Cathedral. Delling Rembran.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Allow me to introduce... the supervising representative of Cathedra, Delling Rembran.

CONTENT: 最初から俺たちを 受け入れるつもりはなかったんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They never planned to accept us!

CONTENT: やつらは経済じゃなく 暴力で...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El dinero daba igual. Querían usar la fuer...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They aren't dealing with us financially, but by using violence-

CONTENT: は... ヤマオカ　クソ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yamaoka... Damn it!

CONTENT: スペーシアンの狭量が...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Spacians are so narrow-minded...

CONTENT: エルノラ? エリィ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Elnora? Eri?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuartel general a las unidades Dominicus.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Headquarters to all Dominicus units.

CONTENT: フォールクヴァング及び 周辺宙域を速やかに封鎖
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bloqueen de inmediato las inmediaciones de Folkvangr.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You are to seal off Folkvangr and its surrounding space at once.

CONTENT: シャトル1隻 逃がしてはならん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que no escape ni una sola lanzadera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't let a single shuttle get away.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nyla? -Run, Wendy.

CONTENT: 早く! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hurry up!

CONTENT: ナイラ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nyla!

CONTENT: 警報?　エルノラ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The alarm? -Elnora!

CONTENT: 評議会が一線を越えてきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The council has crossed the line.

CONTENT: エリィがいないの　エリィが?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't find Eri. -Eri's missing?

CONTENT: 君はエリィを頼む　僕はルブリスで出る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ve a buscar a Eri. Yo saldré con el Lfrith.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You take care of Eri. I'm going out in the Lfrith.

CONTENT: 危険すぎる　敵が来てからじゃ遅すぎる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es muy peligroso. -Será el fin si viene el enemigo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's too dangerous! -It'll be too late by the time they arrive!

CONTENT: 君たちの作った GUNDアームを信じろよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Confía en los GUND-ARM que crearon.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Believe in the GUND-ARM you made.

CONTENT: マネージャーが出るんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're going yourself, manager?

CONTENT: ウェンディと連絡が取れない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't make contact with Wendy.

CONTENT: 僕が足止めしているあいだに 退路を確保してくれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los ralentizaré. Consigan una ruta de huida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Establish an escape route while I'm holding them back!

CONTENT: 本社の救援は どうなんです?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about reinforcements from headquarters?

CONTENT: 期待はできないな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We shouldn't get our hopes up.

CONTENT: LF01 射出!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: LF-01, launching!

CONTENT: GUNDフォーマット パーメットスコア 2!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND Format Permet score, two!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La identificación indica un Mobile Suit.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Checking identification. Matched with target mobile suit.

CONTENT: 了解 行動を開始する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Roger that. Initiating action.

CONTENT: 速い これがガンダムか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So fast! So that's a Gundam?

CONTENT: パーメットスコア 3!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet score, three!

CONTENT: よけた!? バカな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He dodged it? Impossible!

CONTENT: 久しぶりだな この感じ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hace mucho que no sentía esto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's been a while since I felt like this.

CONTENT: やつらは妙なスウォーム兵器を使う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El objetivo usa armas de enjambre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The opponents are using unfamiliar swarm weapons.

CONTENT: 1対1で行くな 数...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do not engage one-on-one. With numbers-

CONTENT: ウェンディ 君か!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that you, Wendy?

CONTENT: ナイラの敵を取ってやるんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have to avenge Nyla.

CONTENT: そうだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: 敵を引きつける!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to lure the enemy away.

CONTENT: 左舷 進行方向 ガンダムタイプ 2機目を確認
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Segundo Mobile Suit de tipo Gundam ubicado a babor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Second Gundam-type mobile suit detected to port side in travel direction.

CONTENT: 情報どおりだな 警戒を怠るな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Coincide con nuestra información. Estén muy atentos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That matches our information. Remain on guard.

CONTENT: ケナンジ ベギルベウを出せ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kenanji, deploy Beguir-Beu.

CONTENT: 了解
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Roger.

CONTENT: 私は これまで⸺　数多の戦場を経験し 1つの結論を得ました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gracias a mi experiencia en innumerables combates, llegué a una conclusión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Throughout my years of experience on countless battlefields, I've come to one conclusion.

CONTENT: 兵器とは 人を殺すためだけに 存在するべきだと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las armas solo existen para matar a otros.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Weapons should only exist to kill people.

CONTENT: 一点の言い訳もなく⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There should be no excuses for this.

CONTENT: 純粋に殺すための 道具を手にすることで⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El mero hecho de sostener una herramienta para matar
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once someone holds in their hands a tool meant purely for killing,

CONTENT: 人は罪を背負うのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: es un pecado en sí mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: they have to bear the sin that comes with it.

CONTENT: しかし ヴァナディースと オックス・アースの⸺　モビルスーツは違う!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero los Mobile Suits de Vanadis y Ochs Earth van más allá.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But the mobile suits of Vanadis and Ochs Earth are different!

CONTENT: 相手の命だけでなく 乗り手の命すら奪う!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le arrebatan la vida al piloto y al adversario.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not only do they take the lives of their opponents, but of their operators as well.

CONTENT: これは道具ではなく もはや呪いです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No son herramientas, son una maldición para todos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is not a tool. It is a curse!

CONTENT: ハアハアハアハア... ウェンディ!　それ以上のスコアは危険だ! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wendy! It's too dangerous to raise the score further!

CONTENT: 命を奪った罰は⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El castigo por arrebatar una vida
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The punishment for taking a life

CONTENT: 機械ではなく人によって 課されなければならない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: debe aplicarlo un humano, no una máquina.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: should be imposed upon us by humans, and not machines.

CONTENT: ナイラ 敵は取るから!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nyla... I'll avenge your death!

CONTENT: 人と人が命を奪い合うことこそ⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A la gente debe matarla la gente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: People must kill or be killed by people.

CONTENT: 戦争という 愚かしい行為における⸺　最低限の作法であるべきです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos debemos permitir esa dignidad en esa estupidez llamada guerra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I believe that's the minimum courtesy in the foolish act of war.

CONTENT: 離れろ ウェンディ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Get back, Wendy!

CONTENT: ただの特化型じゃない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's no ordinary custom type!

CONTENT: 動かない なんで!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't move. Why?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Enlace anulado con el GUND Format.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: GUND Format link suppressed.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is the end of the Gundams.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nyla...

CONTENT: ウェンディ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wendy!

CONTENT: 自ら引き金を引き⸺

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: para comprender el valor de la vida que arrebatamos
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we bear the burden of the life we're taking

CONTENT: あがないきれない罪を背負う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y el peso de nuestro pecado imperdonable.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and of a sin we can never atone for.

CONTENT: 戦争とは 人殺しとは!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No olvidemos lo que significa librar una guerra
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In war, or any form of murder...

CONTENT: そうでなければならない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's how it has to be.

CONTENT: カルド・ナボ博士
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dr. Cardo Nabo.

CONTENT: あなたには ここで死んでいただく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You are going to die here.

CONTENT: 地球という ゆりかごで生まれた人類が⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La humanidad, nacida en la cuna de la Tierra,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Humanity was born in the cradle of Earth.

CONTENT: 宇宙へ出るには この体は脆弱すぎる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: es demasiado frágil para aventurarse en el espacio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our bodies are far too fragile for us to venture into space.

CONTENT: 赤子が服を着るように⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al igual que vestimos a un recién nacido,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just as an infant has to put on clothes,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: humanity must don the GUND to truly go out into space.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es una excusa para una tecnología que pide sacrificios.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's just an excuse for a technology that requires sacrificial victims.

CONTENT: 分かってないね ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't understand.

CONTENT: お前たちが奪うのは⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What all of you are taking away...

CONTENT: GUNDが救うだろう未来だぞ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: is the future that the GUND will save!

CONTENT: エリィ! あ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Eri!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mommy! Mommy!

CONTENT: ママー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mommy!

CONTENT: もう大丈夫 大丈夫だから

Retreat as soon as preparations to blow up the front are complete.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A callback from layer 33?

CONTENT: ママ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mommy...

CONTENT: この子 起きたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did she wake up?

CONTENT: 未登録のパーメット識別コードです

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One, two, three!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They look just like candles! Isn't it pretty?

CONTENT: そうね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're right...

CONTENT: なかなかやる だが...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not bad. However...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is all a Gundam can-

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that you, Elnora?

CONTENT: ナディム パパ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nadim! -Daddy!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't be ridiculous! I'm coming- You're not the only one escaping here!

CONTENT: 生きてくれ　君とエリクトと みんなのために!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sobrevive, por favor. ¡Por tu bien, por el de Ericht, por el de todos!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Live. Both you and Ericht. For everyone's sake!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love you, Nadim.

CONTENT: 僕もだ 愛してる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love you too.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet score, four!

CONTENT: ああっ おかえり
